TopicTitle: Unable to load my save file. Any way it can be recovered?

Articles.Content:
I was playing KSP and my laptop ran out of power mid-flight. After I restarted the game, the save that i was playing is now not loading.

The 'New Horizons' save file has the error "Value cannot be null". Is there any hope for me to recover this?

If you go into KSP/saves/New Horizons/backups, you’ll find some backup save files which are date+time stamped. Grab the newest persistent-(time stamp).sfs, rename it to persistent.sfs and move it to KSP/saves/New Horizons, overwriting the existing one, then load the save in the game.
Thank you so much!! I was almost about to give up..
